text:
Welcome to the Barnardo's Big Toddle Pirate
Warm up song
Ha harrrr
Ready?

Let’s get those bodies moving
So find yourself a space

Put your hands in the air
And a smile upon your face,

We’re happy pirates
Watch us play

We wave to our friends
All through the day

We’re happy pirates
Can’t you see?

There’s room on the ship
for you and me
Ok shipmates, how high can your arms reach? 1, 2, 3!

Let’s wave our arms together
Just like the ocean blue

When we get windy weather
We’ll sail the whole day through

We’re happy pirates
Watch us play

We wave to our friends
All through the day

We’re happy pirates
Can’t you see?

There’s room on the ship
for you and me
What fantastic waves you made, now for your legs. 1, 2, 3!

Put your knees up like your marching
And sing this jolly tune

Can you stand on one leg?
Up until the afternoon

We’re happy pirates
Watch us play

We wave to our friends
All through the day

We’re happy pirates
Can’t you see?

There’s room on the ship
for you and me
Well done, you make very good pirates! 1, 2, 3!

shout 'ooo agh' like a pirate
Its time to walk the plank,

Don’t forget about your parrot
Before your ship has sank

We’re happy pirates
1,2,3

We snap like a crocodile
In the sea

We're happy pirates Jump all night.
Then hide our treasure out of sight

We’re happy pirates
Watch us play

We wave to our friends
All through the day

We’re happy pirates
Can’t you see?

There’s room on the ship
for you and me
oooaarrrrh! Shiver me timbers!
